body: Wow us hentai fanatics look normal compared to the people who get off to this
To be honest I hate gore especially in this type of thing (not judging for those who do) but this was pretty interesting and I read the whole thing nicely done
Finally,someone gets it.
who's the artist?
First comment section I saw with much lesser hypocrites in a guro doujin

Okay you jackasses, if it disgusts you (understandable) then use the back button, and get out of here. there's this thing called guro kink, where people get off on looking at stylized guro hentai. and those very same people will be absolutely devastated by ACTUAL REAL LIFE gore.
So before you put people who enjoy fictional stylized gore in the same box as real life serial killers, i want you to stop playing all of GTA/similar games and because you're no different than an actual serial killer and a robber. and GTA/similar games might not be your preference, or you might not be a gamer, but even then, that'd be saying that the ones who do play those games are serial killers.
Practice what you preach. and get the fuck out of here.
Dine on flesh. AHAHAHAHA I can taste it. So good.
I really likes ^^.. Waiting for another story

also, most people with guro kinks (me included) are disgusted by IRL gore, just like a lot of people who like loli hentai hate IRL CP. we like drawings because no real person is getting hurt by it, and seeing real people being tortured/killed makes most of us feel sick.
to all the pussies in the comments: it's just a drawing and get over yourselves. nobody is forcing you to look at this. the back button exists for a reason.
Absolutely disgusting.
